title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the Project Properties Info page displays text fields with automatic borders. These text fields are identified as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, the fields have different colored backgrounds which make them stand out much worse.
EB: The Project Properties Info page on all motif platforms should not use text fields. Instead, a more appropriate UI element or design should be used that does not display automatic borders for the text fields and has consistent backgrounds across all platforms.
SR:
To reproduce the issue on motif platforms: 
1. Open the Project Properties dialog. 
2. Navigate to the Info page. 
3. Observe the appearance of the text fields with automatic borders and different colored backgrounds on Solaris/AIX/HPUX.
